name: BangXBang
summary: Bang x Bang is a text adventure game with elements of homosexual love, in which you are the son of a gangster, and even though you don't want to get involved in your "family business", one day a big gangster wolf suddenly finds you, then your peaceful life is far away from you...​

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Bang x Bang | #1 黑社會的兒子不想繼承家業 【野貓】 BL視覺小説
